data.title: List of Grammy awards and nominations
data.meta_description: The Grammy Award (stylized as GRAMMY, originally called Gramophone Award), or just Grammy, is an award presented by the Recording Academy to recognize "Outstanding Achievement in the music industry" in the United States. The trophy depicts a gilded gramophone. After the 2022 Grammy Awards, Kanye...
data.text:
